text: int main ( ) { long int i , j , T , n , cost = 0 ; long int a [ 20 ] ; scanf ( "%ld" , & T ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < T ; i ++ ) { cost = 0 ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ j ] ) ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] < a [ j + 1 ] ) { cost = cost + a [ j ] ; } if ( a [ j + 1 ] < a [ j ] ) { cost = cost + a [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%ld" , cost ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; } printf ( "\n" ) ; }
